sentence.Network_en: You need not exult over them, good brothers of the Southern States.
sentence.Network_cn: 南方各洲善心的弟兄们,你们且莫自鸣得意,认为自己比他们强.

sentence.Network_en: Few people would not exult at the abolition of slavery.
sentence.Network_cn: 奴隶制被废除了,人们无不为之欢乐鼓舞.

sentence.Network_en: He would exult over me and despise me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对我耀武扬威,不屑一顾.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... felicity（ 幸福，满足）； exult（ 欢腾，狂欢）； lucky（ 运气好的，吉祥的）；.

求英文中表达感情的形容词！！！！！！_百度知道 ... exhilarative 使高兴的 exult 非常高兴 exultant 非常高兴的.
初中所有英语单词_百度知道 ... exude 渗出,流出,流露 exult 大喜,耀武扬威 100-metre race .100 米赛跑.

list.abs: the port is near , the bells I hear , the people exulting .港口临近了，我已听见钟声，听到了人们的欢呼。
To swell with pride ; gloat or exult ., 自负骄傲自大 ; 心满意足或狂喜.
as Tom King thus ruminated , there came to his stolid vision the form of youth exultant and invincible .就在汤姆·金这样回想的时候，在他迟钝的头脑里出现了一个趾高气扬、不可一世的青年形象。
He obviously exulted in winning ., 他获胜后喜形于色.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin exsultare, frequentative of exsilire 'leap up', from ex- 'out, upward' + salire 'to leap'

entry.def: If you exult in a triumph or success that you have had, you feel and show great happiness and pleasure because of it.

example.ex: He was exulting in a win at the show earlier that day...
example.tran: 他正在为当天早些时候在节目中胜出而欢欣鼓舞。

example.ex: Some individual investors exulted at the record...
example.tran: 一些个人投资者为这一记录欢呼雀跃。

auth_sentence.content: These studio readings exult in the vital spontaneity and alert reciprocity more typical of a live performance.
auth_sentence.res_content: These studio readings exult in the vital spontaneity and alert reciprocity more typical of a live performance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These studio readings exult in the vital spontaneity and alert reciprocity more typical of a live performance.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de分开,分散+sult跳+ory……的→没有目标的跳→散漫的
re再+sult跳→再次跳出来的东西→结果
in进入+sult跳→跳进[别人的事]之中

stems_affixes.value_cn: 商量, 商议, 请教, 参考, 考虑
stems_affixes.word_buile: con一起+sult跳[该'跳'为活跃之意]→一起跳,一起讨论→商量, 商议

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结果,致使,导致,由…而造成
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+sult跳→再次跳出来的东西→结果

sentences.cn: 为...兴高采烈;为...欢欣鼓舞
为...而自豪; 从...中获得乐趣
对...表现出高兴; 对...表示幸灾乐祸

sentences.en: The people exulted at the victory.
The people all over the country exulted in the success in launching a new satellite.
sentences.cn: 全国人民为成功地发射了一颗新的人造卫星而欢欣鼓舞。
